item.description:
Hi Everyone,

This is a Holiday party for Everyone,

I also have this event listed on my Forever Young Meetup site.

http://friends.meetup...


Its a Visit, Bring some food, bring a Fun Grab Bag Gift if you want (OK NO MORE THAN 10 BUCK LIMIT) it can be fun stuff , gag, or whatever.. If you want to participate, about 6:30 or so..
NO GRAB ASSING though..LOL

Bring some Pot Luck Dish, its always good to surprize than fill some lit's thing..we are gonna eat it anyway, even if its similar to someone else.

Its an event to enjoy time with friends and not let the cold weather stop our fun times, but give us a time and place to enjoy conversing and maybe adding the new things on the list of different things that's forthcoming.

Details:
From Tina:

Okay, now that the NEW YEARS PARTY is settled, I'd like to post a Holiday Open House
at my place on December 20. Don't have definite time yet, but probably
towards later afternoon (4 ish). People can come and go as they please and
then maybe we'll do a grab bag at a designated time for those that want to
participate. You can post the following for now and we'll add details
later.


A Holiday Open House at a Private home in Meriden on Saturday,
December 20. More details to follow.

But also check out the other site, i update that one more frequently

I will send out driving Directions and other stuff the day before and on the day of the event.
Check back for updates.
Its not really that far, Hint :
its Near 91 and Rte 15 split.

see you all soon..
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: I will mail out the info the day before and day of the event, check back.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Holiday Party At Tina's in Meriden ADDRESS ALREADY MAILED OUT
